title: Test plane with table part - b

content.question: Based on the values in the table, what is the smallest number of instances at which the acceleration of the plane could equal zero on the open interval 0 < t < 40? Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: Based on the values in the table, what is the smallest number of instances at which the acceleration of the plane could equal zero on the open interval 0 < t < 40? Justify your answer.

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Provide reasons or rationales for solutions and conclusions.
